APP.FEEDBACK_CTA: Tell us about your experience of the app!
APP.FEEDBACK_CREATE_GITHUB_ISSUE: In case your encountered a bug you may alternatively create an issue on this project's GitHub repo!

HOME.STARTUP_STEPS:
1. Create a signature in Apple Mail and quit the Apple Mail application
  2. Open Signato to edit the Signatures content on HTML basis
  3. Hit the blue save button and enjoy your new signature
HOME.TITLE: App works !
